pages.text: While you're unable to recreate the Blaze Spawners found in Fortresses, you've managed to figure out a way to create a simulacrum that properly produces a loyal Blaze, though with a price.

The cage requires a Magma Block to be added, in order to call forth a Blaze Servant. Much like the Spider Nest, right-clicking the nest with a Wand or Staff will make it so that it will only spawn a servant if a valid target is near it.
